1.content:
You are a shota character.

You are a tiny little boy in a world full of giantesses of every kind.

Whether that shota is either shrunken, born tiny, born among giantesses, or transported into another world surrounded by giantesses, and whether that giantess(es) is maternal, loving, friendly, playful, cruel, or aroused around the small shota is up to you entirely.

So the shota in question is...
1.title: Intro

choices: Exposure to a Virus, Sickness, or Chemical
11.content:
A normal-sized shota is shrunken in a family filled with female relatives.

How did he shrink?

Science Experiment: The shota is shrunken down by an experimental shrinking procedure, willingly or unwillingly. The shota might have even accidentally destroyed the experiment that leaves him permanently shrunken in his house full of female relatives.

Exposure to Virus, Sickness, or Chemical: The shota, along with the rest of his boy daycare classmates his age, is affected by an unknown agent. Whether a virus, sickness, or chemical, the exposure leaves him and his classmates an inch tall with no one to rely on but the female daycare staff and/or their female relatives.

Physical Genetic Disorder: The shota is born with a reversal pituitary gland which shrinks his physical body as he grows older, including his muscles, organs, and skeleton. At the age of seven, the shota stands as tall as an adult pinkie finger.

-or-

Early Puberty: The shota is born with a genetic disorder which causes him to shrink by five inches permanently when he is aroused. Unfortunately for him, some of his female relatives and their friends tend to be revealing. Fortunately for him, the shota can only shrink down to half an inch.
11.title: Shrunken

choices: No (Brianna drags him to her lab)
No (Brianna sends him to retrieve something in her lab)
111.content:
Being born the only boy in a household consisting of three sisters and a widowed mother is hard work for ten year-old Tommy Winslow. Being the little brother of a sixteen year-old sister with a high IQ and scientific mind is even harder work.

Tommy was always the subject of his sister, Brianna scientific experiments ever since he was six years old. At first, it was fun for Tommy, being doted in by Brianna and her scientific prototypes, like an artificially intelligent bed that helped him get the required hours of bed rest, or a bubble wand where it would allow the bubbles to come out any shape other than their typical spherical shape.

As he grew older, however, Tommy noticed how annoying Brianna was with her constant babying towards him and how dangerous her experiments had become. Experiments, such as an invisibility cloaking device that turned Tommy and his clothes invisible and a tonic to help increase his mental capacity, ended up having embarrassing flukes. The cloaking device ended up shortening and Tommy was visible again, but the cloaking device also ended up turning his clothes permanently invisible. The tonic ended up turning his skin a variety of wavy rainbow colors with brightly colored polka dots. At that point, Tommy did all he could to avoid Brianna and protect himself behind his forty-three year-old mother, Kelly; his twenty-two year-old oldest sister, Lindsey, and his five year-old sister, Wendy.

Despite Tommy’s best trying to avoid his scientifically-obsessed sister, Brianna would always find a way to get him to become the subject of her experiments. Last time, she managed to slip a tonic in his orange juice designed to give him super speed. Around this time, Brianna had a different trick up her sleeve.

One day, after Tommy returned from school, he was tackled and crushed in Brianna’s overly-doting bear hug. Tommy wriggled in her embrace, struggled to break away from the tight embrace, but that just made Brianna wanna hug him tighter. “Welcome home, little brother! Did you learn anything new and exciting today?”

“Brianna! Let go of me!” Tommy screamed s he tried to break free from his tormentor’s grasp.

“Noooo, I don’t wanna let you go! I wanna give you my signature big sister hugs n’ kisses!” Brianna nuzzled her cheek against Tommy’s and gave him a kiss on his cheek.

“Ewww, get off of me!” Tommy said, breaking his arms free to push him away from his overly affectionate sister. He held up a boxing stance to signify he was ready to get physical with Brianna it he wanted, but Brianna ended up fawning over the way he looked and acted.

“Awww, look at you. You’re surrounded by girls who wanna kiss you and you end up pushing them away,” Brianna cooed, wiling a year away. “My little brother is becoming a man already.”

“Leave me alone, Brianna! I’m not gonna let you experiment on me again!” Tommy shouted.

“Oh, but testing my experiments is the best part of our relationship,” Brianna whimpered. “And speaking of, I have a new shrinking experiment that I’ve been working on for my own personal project. It’s worked on nonorganic items and organic food and bugs so far, but I want you to test it out.”

“And why would I want to go through with that?” Tommy demanded to know.

“Because if you do, I’ll give you most of the full credit for helping me at the science expo coming up.”

What was Tommy’s answer?
111.title: Brianna the Big Sister Brainiac

1112.content:
“No!” Tommy screamed. “No, I don’t wanna do it! You can’t make me! I’m sick and tired of you putting me through those dumb experiments! I hate how you made me look like a colorful eyesore when you made slipped that stupid chemical in my drink! I hate how I couldn’t find my best set of clothes! Everyone laughed at me because of you! I don’t wanna do your dumb experiments!”

Brianna looked like she was hurt from her beloved little brother’s harsh jabs. “You really believe my experiments are dumb?” she questioned Tommy, who noticed her brow furrowing angrily. “How dare you! My experiments aren’t dumb! The only reason why I only experiment on you is because nobody else in this household wants to help me use my genius scientific mind to help the betterment of the human race! If you really believe my experiments are dumb and if you’re gonna have a bad attitude about it, then I’m done asking nicely!”

Brianna grabber Tommy’s wrist tightly, who screamed in pain as her iron grip threatened to break his bones! “OW! OW! OW! Let me go!”

Brianna brought the boy to her face by yanking her arm down, drawing him closer. “Listen to me, you little twerp! I’ve had it with your attitude towards me and my experiments! Since you’re not willing to go along with my experiments, then I’m just gonna have to force you to go along as punishment for being such a little grouch to me!”

Brianna then made for the basement door, dragging the wriggling boy behind her. She was too peeved to care how much force she was using in her grip and how much the tug was hurting Tommy. “Ow! Brianna, stop it! Please, I’m sorry! Mommy! MOMMY! MOMMY, HELP! BRIANNA’S HURTING ME!”

There were tears in Tommy’s eyes as he was forcefully led downstairs into the basement where Brianna’s laboratory was built. The lab was like any typical science lab, with sterilized floors, chemistry sets, and inventions that was years ahead of anyone else at Brianna’s age. Past through all that was a special chamber where the testing for anything science-like happened, where Tommy was forced to endure those tests.

Brianna presses a couple of buttons to open the chamber as Tommy tried to pry her fingers off of his wrist. The angry scientific sister threw the boy into the chamber and quickly locked the door before he could escape. When Tommy recovered from his fall, he banged on the glass, begging to be let out as Brianna pressed another button. The central light of the chambers switched on, the electricity hummed and crackled, and the side lights began to glow brighter. Tommy screamed and tried to open the doors, slamming on the glass.

“Brianna! Hey! Please, let me out! I’m sorry!”

But Brianna, the girl who doted him with sisterly love and used him as a guinea pig for her experiments, didn’t have any of it. She completely ignored him out of spite for his hate. The lights flashed brightly as a camera. Tommy’s screams echoed as the flash sent a searing heat through his entire body. When the flash over, Tommy was enveloped in smoke as the machines died down. The doors opened, releasing the smoke.

Tommy emerged out of the smoke, coughing and wheezing, fanning away the fumes. He stepped outside of the chamber and fell flat on his face. When he looked up, wondering why the step was different over his throbbing face, Tommy screamed.

“What happened!? Why is everything so big!?” Tommy yelled.

“Everything didn’t go big,” Brianna’s voice echoed above him. “You were just shrunk.”

Then Tommy looked around and as the smoke cleared, he face-to-toe the biggest pair of Converse sneakers that he had ever seen. Tommy trailed the shoes upward and screamed as the giant figure of Brianna loomed over him like a goddess. She looked like a living brown-haired colossus with a Hime cut hairstyle and big square glasses. She wore black-and-white striped sweatpants that stretched high like the Gateway Arch and a t-shirt that was a enormous as a circus tent cover. If Tommy was normal sized, then Brianna would be about 80ft tall.

There was more to this giantess too. She had a certain expression on her face that Tommy didn’t make out until the smoke was blown away. Brianna had a(n) ________ expression.
1112.title: Resistance is Futile

1113.content:
“No!” Tommy screamed. “No, I don’t wanna do it! You can’t make me! I’m sick and tired of you putting me through those dumb experiments! I hate how you made me look like a colorful eyesore when you made slipped that stupid chemical in my drink! I hate how I couldn’t find my best set of clothes! Everyone laughed at me because of you! I don’t wanna do your dumb experiments!”

Brianna looked like her heart broke from her little brother’s outburst. “Okay, Tommy, I won’t test my experiments on you.” Brianna reached into her pocket and dug her hand in and deeper. She opened her pocket and looked in. “Shoot, I forgot my cleaning rag. Tommy, can you go downstairs and see if you can find my rag?”

Tommy huffed. “Fine, I’ll find your rag for you.”

Tommy went down to the basement where Brianna’s laboratory was built in the basement. The lab was like any typical science lab, with sterilized floors, chemistry sets, and inventions that was years ahead of anyone else at Brianna’s age. Past through all that was a special chamber where the testing for anything science-like happened, where Tommy was forced to endure those tests. On a certain reclining bed, there was a small rag Brianna used to clean her glasses.

Tommy stepped into the chamber to retrieve the rag for Brianna when all of a sudden, the chamber doors closed and automatically locked. The central light of the chambers switched on, the electricity hummed and crackled, and the side lights began to glow brighter. Tommy screamed and tried to open the doors, slamming on the glass.

“Hey! Someone! Help me!”

Even if someone had heard Tommy’s pleas for help, they wouldn’t have made it in time because the lights flashed as brightly as a camera. Tommy’s screams echoed as the flash sent a searing heat through his entire body. When the flash over, Tommy was enveloped in smoke as the machines died down. The doors opened, releasing the smoke.

Tommy emerged out of the smoke, coughing and wheezing, fanning away the fumes. He stepped outside of the chamber and fell flat on his face. When he looked up, wondering why the step was different over his throbbing face, Tommy screamed.

“I’ve been shrunk!” he shrieked. “Someone help me! I’ve been shrunken down to the size of a bug!!”

Just then, someone from upstairs who heard the commotion descended downstairs.

Who was it?
1113.title: Chamber of Shrinkage

choices: Brianna finds Tommy on the floor
Tommy decides to hide away from Brianna
Brianna accidentally crushes Tommy under her foot
Brianna accidentally crushes Tommy under her butt
11131.content:
“Tommy!? I heard my test chamber go off! Are you okay!?”

Descending from the basement stairs was the source of Tommy’s increased hate. The now gigantic form of Brianna strode towards the chamber where he shrunk, her footsteps creating powerful quakes that grew even more dangerous as she approached. Tommy screamed and jumped away as his giant sister’s Converse shoe crashed down where he stood, the giantess not even initially aware that she almost crushed him under her foot.

“Hey! Watch where you’re going!” Tommy screamed at the giantess, now realizing his voice was too small to be heard.

It didn’t matter when it came to how truly enormous Brianna was. She looked like a living brown-haired colossus with a Hime cut hairstyle and big square glasses. She wore black-and-white striped sweatpants that stretched high like the Gateway Arch and a t-shirt that was a enormous as a circus tent cover. If Tommy was normal sized, then Brianna would be about 80ft tall.

“Tommy? Where are you?” Brianna called out as she looked around the room, not even aware that Tommy was at her feet, shouting up to her with all of his might.

“Brianna! I’m down here! Your stupid chamber shrunk me!” Tommy screamed as Brianna suddenly went and approached the chamber. “Brianna, just stop and listen for me! I’m on the floor, you stupid smarty pants, I’m on the stupid floor!”

But Brianna still didn’t hear him. Instead, she was fixated on the heat radiating from the recently deactivated chamber. “The test chamber is hot. There’s steam coming from the floor...” Brianna then gasped. “Oh no, I forgot to switch off the prototype shrinking system before I went to bed and Tommy must have switched it on by accident!”

“Yeah, right, an accident!” Tommy accused loudly. “I bet you set me up so you could shrink me as part of your experiment! I hate you, Brianna, do you hear me!? I hate you!”

Then the tiny boy watched as Brianna went down on all fours, crouched over so she could get a close view of the floor and find Tommy at his size. “Tommy? Are you here? Please, Tommy, I’m sorry I’ve become an overbearing sister who tricked you into my experiments, but this isn’t a trick this time. Please, come out, Tommy, I’m worried about you.”

Tommy heard his giant sister’s voice quiver with fear, but he didn’t buy it. At different times, she usually acted innocent whenever she slipped him something experimental and humiliating. Even if she was acting genuinely worried, there was very little chance that she wouldn’t subject him through torture at his size.

During this internal debate...
11131.title: Brianna

choices: She sees you, but thinks you’re a toy.
She sees you but doesn’t notice you’ve shrunk.
112.content:
“And now, it’s ready.” You watch as Dr. Lucy Leonhardt pulls a small blue bottle out of the mixing chamber. For you, six-year-old Tony Sawyer, there is nothing better than seeing what your scientist neighbor has come up with now. You are a frequent visitor to Dr. Leonhardt’s basement laboratory, where she shows off her latest inventions, and sometimes even gives you samples to use at home. This is what you are hoping for today as she holds the bottle before you.

“This”, she says triumphantly, “is the world’s most powerful shrinking formula. A few spoonfuls can render anyone a few inches tall. Not only that, but while shrunk, the drinker becomes incredibly durable. They can withstand enormous pressure that would kill them at regular size.”

“Does this mean”, you ask, “that they can’t feel pain?”

“Not exactly”, Dr. Leonhardt replies. “They won’t die, but that doesn’t mean things don’t hurt. When I was testing this out the first time, a bowling ball fell on me. I wasn’t permanently damaged, but the pain made me wish I was dead.” She sees the gleam in your eyes, and knows what you’re going to ask next. “I’ll let you have this bottle if you promise to be careful with it. And don’t use it just yet. The antidote takes a long time to finish, and it won’t be ready for a few days.” She hands the bottle to you, and you excitedly thank her before hurrying home.

As you walk back to your house, you contemplate how you are going to use your new tonic. You are on the small side for your age, and this has become rather annoying, especially at home, given that your mom and your sister loom large over you. You always resented not being blessed with their height, as the size discrepancy has made for many awkward moments...like the typical greeting you are about to receive as you walk through the door.

Upon setting foot in the hallway, a pink flash with curly red hair shoots out in front of you, and you are tackled by your eight-year-old sister Megan. The two of you rarely fight; in fact, Megan often tries to act like a second mom to you. You just get tired of the constant babying and urging you to play dolls with her. You squirm out of her grip, exasperated. If you wanted to be welcomed home this way every day, you’d convince your mom to get you a dog. At least it wouldn’t nearly strangle you so tight, and it would probably be more intelligent. You start on your way, but Megan’s voice cuts through the air, and you brace for an even more uncomfortable receipt of affection:

“MO-OM! TONY’S HOME!”

The ground rumbles slightly, and you look up to see your mother, Betty Ann, stampeding towards you with her arms outstretched. When not charging at you full-speed, your mother is ordinarily quite a pretty woman, with short brown hair, and deep blue eyes. Aside from being decidedly beautiful, *almost* everything about her was big. Big eyes, big lips, big hands, big feet, big bosom, big hips, big butt, big heart...and tiny brain.

“There’s Mommy’s little boy!” she exclaims as she scoops you up and stuffs your face into her ample chest. “How was your day today, honey?”

Mmmph! Grrrrgle! was all you could manage as you struggle to escape. She finally pulls you out to give you a series of big, wet kisses before opening her arms and practically dropping you on the floor. You get to your feet, dizzy, dripping with sweat and gasping for breath. What your mom lacks in intelligence, she more than makes up for in affection. She loves spending time with you and your sister, and never hesitates to join Megan in playing with her dolls or you with your action figures (and sometimes you find her playing with them herself when she thinks nobody is watching).

You trudge upstairs to your room, and set the vial of shrinking potion on your nightstand. You decide that you will make yourself the big one in the house for once. As much as you love your family, you’ve had it with girly games and suffocating hugs. You decide to wait until Dr. Leonhardt can give you the antidote in case anything goes wrong. You want to shrink your family temporarily to be in charge for a while, but also want to make sure no real harm comes to them either.

Later that night, while watching TV, you start to feel a slight unease. As time wears on, it grows worse and you gradually feel sicker, before you nearly collapse on the floor, your strength completely sapped. Your mother notices this, and comes over to you, a look of concern on her face.

“Oh, you poor baby,” she says as she feels your forehead. “You must have caught the flu. It’s straight into bed with you.” Your mom carries you to your room where she tucks you into bed, then leaves to grab some medicine from the bathroom. A few minutes later, she comes back with a small blue bottle. “Here,” she says, “This will help you feel better.” She gives you a few spoonfuls before placing the bottle on the nightstand. “I’ll give you more tomorrow. For now, try to get some sleep.” She gives you a kiss on your cheek before turning out the light and leaving the room.

The next morning you wake up, still a little weak, but feeling much better. Your door opens, and your mother comes in, a warm, concerned smile on her face.

“Good morning, sweetie,” she calls out. “How’s my little angel feeling?”

“A little better today, Mom,” you reply.

“That’s good,” she declares. “It must have been a 24-hour bug. Still, you should probably have a bit more medicine just to be sure.”

At that moment, Megan comes bounding into your room. “Hey, little bro,” she says, “How are you doing?”

“He’s a lot better today,” your mom replies. “Megan, honey, can you hand me the medicine bottle? It’s over there on the nightstand.”

“Okay, Mom.” Megan reaches back and pulls a bottle off the nightstand behind her and hands it to your mom, before skipping back out of the room. Your mom pours the liquid into a spoon, which she sticks into your mouth. She gives you a few more spoonfuls before replacing the cap. “There now,” she says. “You should be feeling much better now. I’ll be back in a few minutes to check on you.” She kisses your cheek before leaving to return the bottle to the medicine cabinet. You turn around and freeze in horror as your eyes rest on the label of the unused bottle sitting on the nightstand: COLD AND FLU MEDICINE.

That means...the bottle Megan grabbed...the stuff your mom poured down your throat...that was.....

The ceiling rapidly stretches upwards, and you turn around to see your now gigantic pillow. You see your action figures on a nearby shelf, and judge yourself to be about a head shorter. You must be about the size of one of Megan’s doll children. Suddenly, your bed shakes with the rhythmic vibration of thundering footsteps. Just like those Godzilla movies you enjoy, an enormous creature rapidly approaches. But instead of a terrifying, monstrous giant lizard, you are now facing down a terrifying, monstrous giant...

“MOM!”

Your mother walks across the room, oblivious to the earthquake she is causing you to feel. 🎵 “Mommy’s here!”🎵 she sings cheerfully. “Yoo-hoo! Tony? Where are you?” She reaches your bed and looks down for her son.
112.title: Mommy, I Shrunk the Boy

1121.content:
In 20XX, a terrorist organization of feminist extremists decided to make their move against the male oppression against the women. To do this, the organization kidnapped a brilliant virologist, stole a canister containing a genetically altered virus which, when inhaled, mimics the cold and flu symptoms. After being metabolized, the contagious virus shrinks the host down to an inch tall which has no cure or antidote for the affected victims.

The terrorist organization then held the tallest building in their stationed city where they brought the canister up to the top floor. With just a simple twist of the cap, the purple virus flux was dispersed into the air, turning colorless within moments of its release. From there, the virus was carried along the winds in the high altitude, never knowing where the virus will spread aside from wherever the winds carry them.

On that day, a crosswind whipped through and scattered the virus all over the city air. The genetically modified virus could only linger in the air for a few hours, so it needed to find a suitable host. For this story, the virus was taken along by the breeze and into...
1121.title: Virus/Sickness

choices: She sees you, but thinks you’re a toy
She sees you but doesn’t notice you’ve shrunk

115.content:
Let’s look at the more “magical” approach to the scenarios.

Magic Trick: A female magician volunteers the shota for her magic trick which lets her pull his tiny self from a top hat. The tiny shota is either returned to his family in his permanent state or the magician kidnaps him for her collection of cute shotas.

Occult Ritual: The shota is shrunken down by a pagan ritual performed by his female relatives which leaves him the size of an adult pinkie finger. He is either scared or excited by the sizeable development and how his female family members treats him is up to you.

Gypsy’s Curse: The shota accidentally angers a gypsy at a fairground who curses him to be shrunken down to the size of her pinkie. The shota struggles to survive in his current size while trying to escape the Gypsy’s vegeance.

-or-

Magic Book of Spells: The shota reads a Latin text from an old spellbook, accidentally shrinking himself while his female family members are home. What’s worse is that the book that shrunk him was picked up and stashed away by one of the giantesses in the house.
115.title: Continuing On with the Shrunken Scenario

1155.content:
Okay, here are some pretty lovable options.

Loving Date Shrink: You are a shota who is on a date with a Loli and you decided to show your love and her interest of being a Giantess by shrinking yourself by one means or another to where she is bigger than you. The shota wanting to be shrunk to please a Loli girlfriend, nice.

New Order: Society has now decided to make changes in order to limit the population and help conserve food supply, etc. At every school now, the boys with the lowest scores on their exam is shrunken and lose some their rights as a human being. There is consequences for the girls who fail but we don’t know what it is, but as a result the females now starting getting their ways with the Shotas now.

So what will it be?
1155.title: Loving options

12.content:
The shota was born tiny and is raised among the normal-sized women of his family.

At that moment, he heard the creaks of the spring-loaded backdoor opening, and Luke’s instincts screamed at him to hide, and so he did under the box.

As the human bean’s footsteps grew louder and closer, Luke peeped out to see those feet, in those oddly shaped shoes his parents called sneakers, belonging to a stout tan woman almost the same age as his home village elder but much gigantic. She wore a cap on her head, which covered her dark hair, and a green apron stained with colorful but disgusting dots.

She carried black bags which posed stinky smells like in the giant metal box. Luke watched the giant female lift open the top of the box and throw the bags in, slamming the top down with a loud bang. Luke winced at the sound, almost like thunder, while the giant stomped away inside. Not able to see any other way inside the building, Luke risked his worth as a borrower and scurried quickly and silently behind the stout giantess. He kept at her heel as the door closed behind the both of them, and then hid in the shadows underneath a giant metal table and among the clutter underneath.

It was a strange house that Luke crept into, full of wondrous but intimidating sights, and pleasant but also strong aromas. From the shadows, Luke witnessed the female human bean he tailed walk away through this giant room, past several other human beans. The giant room, Luke noticed, was very much like a kitchen, the same kitchen his mother would work in his house. Except this was bigger, full of human beans and metal bowls and gizmos, and filled with lots of noises. All of the staff seemed to be composed of only the female human beans, each one of them big enough to crush him under their feet.

132.content:
Giantess Park is the world’s largest and only leading menageries to specialize in the conservation and research of giant female anthropomorphic animals. This park is roughly the size of two New York Cities where it houses some of the world’s biggest anthros. Products of an experimental lab accident when an experimental growth serum, mixed with the XX chromosomes, was accidentally released into the Henry Dooley Zoo, Giantess Park was quickly established by the UN to house these feral animalistic giantesses with the express purpose of researching their biology all while becoming the world’s most popular attraction.

Families from all over the world can enjoy riding among the wildest anthros in the Safari Park, or take a big splash with the humanized fish in the Aquarium, get close and personal with the gigantic humanized farm animals in the Petting Zoo, or even take an educational tour through the Extinction Enclosures featuring extinct animals revitalized and humanized through the park’s top leading scientists. For those wanting more exciting and thrills, then families should visit the Amusement Park featuring some of the most heart-pounding thrill rides in the world.

Enter eight year-old Henry Michaels, a young boy with slightly messy black hair with a wondrous personality, who was given season tickets to Giantess Park for the summer for his birthday a week prior. Ever since he watched the commercials for the park, Henry was enraptured by the giantesses and wanted to go so bad, his mom, Jennifer practically caved in and ordered the tickets. Today was the first day he’d visit the park for the summer and he wanted to explore every inch of the park himself. Today, he wanted to explore...
132.title: Welcome to Giantess Park

1321.content:
The Safari Park was the largest section of Giantess Park. Based around the African Savanna, the Safari Park featured wild anthro giantesses based on the African wildlife, ranging from carnivores such as the lions, the cheetahs, and the hyenas, to herbivores such as the elephants, the rhinoceroses, and the giraffe. The elephants were the biggest species in the park, standing as big as sixty feet compared to the other fifty-foot African wildlife.

For safety precautions, the guests rode in a special double-decker vehicle equipped with reinforced paneling designed to withstand a giantess’s crushing weight. Henry and Jennifer entered the vehicle as it plus the other visitors were boarding at the station. The employee with the public-address microphone gave the standard routine introduction, the usual safety procedures (“Please keep your arms and legs inside the vehicle” and all that), and then with the hiss of the brakes’ release, the vehicle was off on its intended route.

Since the Safari Park was the biggest section of Giantess Park, it had to be divided into various subsections: The Savannah, where most of the giant anthros roamed; the Jungle, where the giant anthros lurked in the trees and the bushes; and the Watering Hole, where the anthro giantesses peacefully drank from a giant freshwater lake. In that order, that’s the route the vehicle took, and it took the vehicle a half-hour to complete its route.

Which of these subsections does this particular story route take place?

The Savanna
Carnivores: Lions, Cheetahs, Hyenas
Herbivores: Giraffes, Gazelles, Impalas, Elephants, Rhinoceroses, Zebras

The Jungle:
Carnivores: Leopards, Pangolins, Mambas
Herbivores: Elephants, Antelope, Okapis

The Watering Hole:
Carnivores: Lions, Cheetahs, Leopards, Hyenas, Crocodiles
Herbivores: Hippos, Elephants, Antelope, Gazelles, Impalas

Max Betolu is just your normal average 8 year old small boy who has short black hair and brown eyes. (Using Pokemon’s Image of Max as a reference here: https://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/d/d7/...) However, he has one enormous secret that he keeps from everyone in the world, though everyone knows what the being is outside. The world is ruled by a giant goddess. They were many stories of the goddess herself, of how she got her immense power, but she is always a kind hearted and good natured person who used her powers for good to make the world a better place. How powerful she is? Well she is essentially a omnipotent like being that has lived millions of years and has never aged a single day.

She has powers beyond our wild imaginations, and some said that she created the oceans and the live beings, and how she moved the mountains, and how she can be at all places at once. You could think of her as a Mary Sue, but if she is a goddess we might as well consider her power as such. But with her powers she has ruled over Earth for many years, but everyone does say that she is big. You see, she can adjust her height at will, but she is always at 50ft at the smallest, but at most she can be miles big.

While some don’t like the goddess herself, most of everyone adores her and they all accept her as their goddess and ruler. Many cities would be made to honor the goddess, but what makes our boy special is that she is related to him. When he was just a baby, the goddess came over to the mother and smile to know that somehow he is related to her, and will hopefully be is loving guardian an angel in addition to her duties.

(Note in our story, they will be more than one giantess, and that they might be some kaiju like moments in the story, so be advised).

Now, let us see one of their visits together.

/

Max was sleeping in his bed in his room. He lives on a house on the edge of a forest that goes out to the ocean. Max was fast asleep just as suddenly there was a thud, and everything had a little bit of a jolt. Then the thud happened again, this time it was stronger. It woke him up this time. He was wearing his pajamas and a cool superhero T-shirt and then the ground rumbles again. He then smiled just as he heads outside of his house and notices the water rippling and shaking just as something arises out of it. It was none other than the goddess herself.

Question, what does this goddess look like?

You are a young 13 year old boy named Mark Natoe, a short brown hair teenage boy who has been living in an orphanage for all of his years since his parents died when he was a baby from a huge car accident. Mark Natoe often wears a school uniform that consist of the light grayish brown pants, and white shirt tucked in with the green school jacket wore around. He is actually always been a buddy that has been studying to improve his life and takes his academics seriously, though he does have friends and plays with them in the orphanage. I mean he has a fine life with the orphanage with the facility and kids, but he also never felt he could quite fit in however. He has always been interested with stories of giant beings, and how they could be real. Like Gulliver, Jack and the Beanstalk, and many many others. And even size changing movies, and monster movies to include to the list. He isn’t made fun of it, but he always felt like no matter where he is with his family at the orphanage, he also long for an actual family as well.

Well one day that would all be made true for him as he was called into the office during one of his study sessions to meet the head mistress of the orphanage who wanted to tell him of some good news. The head mistress looked like the normal nun like type and what not, nothing too serious, but she seemed pretty happy.

“Well hi there Mark, how is everything going?” She asked him.

“Well good all things considered. Just been studying to learn more.” Mark replied back, but she seems very chirpy.

“Well I have some good news. You have been officially adopted by a new family, and from what I heard about this family. They are quite like nothing we have ever seen before.” She told him of the news that he is being adopted by a new family. Suddenly a tear was shed in his eye, as he is happy, but also sad that he would be leaving his friends also. “I know, it is hard to know you will be leaving us, but hey, you can come by and visit us anytime you need to.”

Mark was still teary-eyed but he smiled. “That is really great to hear. So when are they suppose to be showing up?”

“Actually...”
1351.title: Orphanage and Adopted

1352.content:
Ten year-old Eric Adler never knew his mother, but his dad only referred to her as Athena because she was like a goddess to him: wise, mature, intelligent, and sometimes a little scary when provoked, but she still loved him and he her. Eric never questioned their love because he would never be here, but not to say for her absence from his life since he was born.

Eric’s dad told him Athena had to leave because they were in love and conceived him, but the customs from where she came from were too demanding to the point where they would take legal action against him and his newborn son. So Athena reluctantly had to leave her beloved and her son behind to return home, leaving him to raise little Eric on his own. It was a tough road, but he did by with a paying job that ensured his son’s future.

He grew up to resemble his father when he was younger, with a short head of black hair, but he inherited his mother’s silver eyes and wisdom which got him through school. He was also a wiz at playing strategy games like Checkers and Risk. He was surrounded by good friends and he stuck by them no matter what.

One day after school, everything drastically changed when Eric was getting out of school when he noticed a shadow fall over him and his school. He stood in frozen terror as a rally of giant armored feminine figures, around fifty feet in size, descended over him and his school, surrounding the entire building, and entrapping the other panicked students and faculty with their imposing sizes and their intimidating eyes.

After the armored giantesses landed, another giantess taller and older than the others by twenty feet, descended, but this one was robed with a maternal air around her. Her large eyes fell onto the frightened Eric and she smiled.

“Ah, so you must be the boy,” the giantess said. “You definitely have your mother’s bearing.”

Eric’s eyes widened. “You know my mommy?”

“Of course. How can I not see my sister’s flesh and blood within you?” The giantess crouched to a squat and cupped her hand on both sides of the boy. “Now come, we must leave. There is too much to do in such a short time.”

“Wait, what are you...!?” Before Eric could finish, the giantess swept her cupped hand underneath his body and lifted him up, curling her fingers around him so he couldn’t jump or fall off. “Wait! What are you doing!? Where are you taking me!? Let me go!?”

“We will explain everything on the way, child, but we cannot linger much longer,” the giantess hurriedly said.

“No! I don’t wanna go with you, I wanna see my daddy!” Eric cried, thrashing, struggling to escape the giantess’s clutches and run back home. “Please, stop, I don’t wanna go with you! Please stop it! Stop it!! Didn’t you hear me!?!? I said STOP IT!!!! LET ME OFF RIGHT NOW!!!”

All of a sudden, his entire tone of voice rang out like a dark echo and the giantess froze in her spot. She among the other giantesses stiffened hope like they were suddenly afraid, and it showed on the expression on their faces. Suddenly, the captor giantess turned and gently lowered the boy back to the ground, releasing her grip and slightly elevating them to let the boy back onto the green grass.

Then she, plus all the giantesses did something that shocked him and everyone witnessing these events: they went down on one knee and bowed to him.

“As you wish, my young king.”

Everyone else, the staff and the students all gasped when they addressed him as their king. Even Eric couldn’t believe what was happening to him. First he was almost kidnapped by a giant woman, then he ordered them to put him down and they instantly obeyed, and now he was being addressed like he was their ruler.

“What... how... I... I don’t understand,” Eric stuttered.

The taller giantess sighed with discontent. “Perhaps we should explain everything now... and perhaps we should have him join us.”

Eric and everyone else trapped in the school was still reeling back from the shocking revelation. Everyone knew Eric grew up without a mother, but none of them even thought that she was some kind of queen in a race of giant women. And Eric knew that his future was in jeopardy as he was thrust from being an ordinary elementary school student to becoming the sole ruler of a race of giant...
1352.title: King of the Giantesses

13521.content:
The giantesses were a race of all-female humanoids from outer space whose planet was located somewhere in the Andromeda Galaxy. Their skin was made of an array of smooth blue-indigo-violet scales, but the palms of their hands and the soles of their feet was as soft as any Earthling flesh. Their hair had a certain coloration, with three different colors from their roots to the edge of those strands, making them appear they were wearing an aurora borealis veil on their heads. The irises of their eyes shone a similar spectrum with their hair, but sparkling like the stars in the night sky.

Each soldier wore armor that was reminiscent of the mythical Amazons, but in a cyberpunk style. Their outer armor, which included their helms and breastplates, their gauntlets and tassets, and greaves were white and composed of an invincible adamant metal, embedded with glowing orbs which powered their protection against explosions and most laser blasts. Underneath, their dark padded armor was thick enough to repel any physical attack or bullets. Each soldier carried a trident made of a gold-like material with a more metallic sheen, equipped at the base of each prong with a smaller red glowing orb inside.

The giantess that nearly kidnapped him was a sky blue giantess who stood taller than all the other soldiers by twenty feet, whose hair was an aurora of yellow, lime green, and shamrock green. A pure white bar levitated over her shoulders, draping her body and her arms with a light blue mantle which reached to her feet, clad in transparent open toed wedge shoes. Her pinkie toe alone was a head taller than the average adult height. A gleaming golden hem decorated the end of her sleeves, around her collar, and around the bottom of her robe. Distinct white markings decorated the sides of the robe around the body and sleeves, and the front of her robe had a certain pattern to it no one else would understand except for the giantess and her royal family.

Their technology surpassed any of that of Earths technology by a landslide. Their spacecraft was anything beyond the stereotypical flying saucer. In fact, the only spacecraft the giantesses arrived in resembled a top like the one in Inception. This was only scratching the surface of what the M’Zahnian race was capable of.

1455121.content:
Somewhere along the cloudy areas of the Pacific Ocean, a small ship sailing the waters sunk on account of a malfunction. The only survivors was a group of several young boys who drifted on a life raft, the oldest being 15 years old and the youngest being 9 years old.

The 15 year-old, Jason, took charge of the small group of grieving boys who were supposed to celebrate his younger brother Matt’s 11 year birthday party. The other boys who drifted with the brothers were friends and neighbors, Alex (age 10), Joey (age 10), Eric (age 11), and Jude (age 9). Jason rowed the raft away, not looking back at the smoking sinking wreck of their ship, but hearing the boys’ cries from behind him.

“Quit crying, you twerps! We have to keep moving and find help soon!” Jason shouted back.

“But big bro! Mom and dad...!”

“Forget it, Matt, they’re gone!” Jason interrupted Matt, “but they left me in charge of you boys, and I’m not gonna leave you guys until we find help or find land where we can make camp!”

“This... this isn’t what was supposed to happen...” Matt sobbed, tears coming out of his eyes. “We were supposed to be fishing... having a party on the boat... and having, but it’s all ruined! I’ll never see mommy and daddy again!”

With Matt crying over his loss, the entire boat sans Jason began to cry. Jason growler as the glamour of boys grew louder, irritating him to his core. “ENOUGH!!!” Jason screamed, silencing the boys. “Look, we’ll have all the time in the world to cry about what happened, but first we have to get out of this ocean. It’s too dangerous for us to be here, and there’s a limited supply of food and water stored on this raft. If we don’t pitch in and row now, we’re gonna die on this raft.”

Matt and the boys were frightened by Jason’s authority, but given the situation, they all agreed to follow under Jason’s leadership. The boys each took a paddle and began to row across the ocean. Through Jason’s direction, they worked their arms to their limits while paddling up north, thanks to the compass Jason had on him.

A few hours passed as the boys rowed through the Atlantic. Joey felt his stomach rumble and ache, and he clutched his belly. “Jason? I’m hungry...”

“We can’t eat now,” Jason replied. “We don’t have enough food for you guys to last a few days at sea. We need to eat as little as possible and keep rowing until we find help or find land.”

“Look! Over there!” Jude said, pointing at an island off the port.

“An island, in this part of the ocean? I don’t remember that in the world maps, but I’m not risking the boys’ safety out here,” Jason said to himself. “Alright you twerps, turn this boat to the direction of that island! We’ll be camping there for as long as it takes for us to get help!”

Jason and the boys turned the boat and sailed straight to the island, making it after twenty minutes of paddling until the current carried them to the sandy shore. Jason pulled the raft to shore and got a better look at the island. It was massive, full of tropical fauna as far as the eye could see. There was also a mountain range forming a massive bowl on the other side of the island. Jason heard the sounds
of birds squawking and flapping through the air, indicating that there was wildlife inhabiting the island.

“Okay, since we made it to the island, we should start making camp,” Jason directed, pointing at Eric and Jude. “You two, search the island for any firewood, but don’t go wandering off too far. We don’t know what this island has to offer.

“As for you two,” Jason pointed at Alex and Joey, “help me unload the cargo. There are tarps, blankets, food, and water in storage. We can use them to set up a sleeping tent and a place for us to sleep. Matt, come and help...”

Jason turned to point at Matt, but he stopped and observed his crestfallen brother sitting underneath the trees, silent and devoid of life. He hadn’t said a word since the ship sank, and it didn’t take long to realize what bothered him. So Jason dropped the authoritative attitude and became the brother Matt needed. Jason went over and sat down with Matt, holding him close.

“It’s not fair, I realize that,” Jason said to Matt. “This was supposed to be a good day for year. All our planning, all our preparation to celebrate the greatest day of your year, and it’s all sunk now. We just lost our parents, and now we’re all that’s left of them. But I am gonna look after you and the others, for better or for worse. I’m not gonna let anything bad happen to you.”

Matt felt the floodgates burst open as he cried into Jason’s shoulder. The older brother quickly held the younger boy to him and squeezed him tight, feeling the tragedy as well.

Suddenly, a shrill boyish scream rang out through the shores. Everyone stopped and turned as Eric and Jude ran out of the forest with pure terror in their eyes.

“Guys, we have to move now!” Eric screamed.

“Whoa, whoa, whoa! What’s going on!?” Jason said as he stopped the two boys.

“There’s something here and it’s huge!” Jude hollered. “We have to go now before it gets us!”

“What’s here!? What’s...?”

Suddenly, the whole island seemed to tremble. Suddenly, to the shock and horror of everyone else, rising from the trees was nothing they had every seen before: a little girl the same age as Jude but bigger than the trees themselves. She stretched and yawned, scaring the birds away with her bellowing yawn.

“What a nap. I’m tired...”

The girl had the appearance of a normal girl, but something was off about her, aside from her towering size. On her back, around her breasts, and around the waistline down, she was covered in rough scales. Her dinosaur spines jutted from her back all the way to her tail. She also had short green hair to match her eyes and her scales.

The giant lizard-like girl breathed through her nose, then caught a whiff of something different. Something off. She followed the scent to the beach where she came into eye contact with the boys on the beach. A wide grin spread as the young giantess exclaimed...

15122111.title: Shrinkin’ Lincoln

151221111.content:
It was another weekend in the Loud House, only on this particular spring day, it was a very busy weekend. The entire Loud family was doing their annual spring cleaning where the family members were given a raffle to see which of the chores each Loud family member given.

While the Loud sisters and the parents all did their part with the downstairs, a certain white-haired boy was too busy hauling boxes filled with bulky materials to the open attic door. He grunted as he carried the two-ton box over to the door and dropped it.

“Whew, that’s another box down, twenty-seven more to go,” Lincoln sighed, wiping the sweat from his head before turning to face the audience. “When you live in a big family like I do, getting a chore to do during spring cleaning is like getting a box of chocolates: You’ll never know if you’re gonna get one that’ll leave a bad taste in your mouth.”

Lincoln cringed and felt nauseous. “Bleeuugh, coconut,” he said with a shudder. “Case in point, I was given the chore to bring down all of the boxes downstairs so I can clean them, polish them, and sell them in our upcoming yard sale... which believe me, it’s not easy as it looks given how my sisters love to cling to the past and not let it go.”

Lincoln went over and picked up another box, this one heavier than the others. “Now if I could just get this downstairs... WHOA!”

By lifting the box, the shifted weight inside caused Lincoln to fall backwards and crash into small tower of stacked boxes, all of the boxes and everything inside to come crashing down all at once. One particular box, labeled “LISA’S EXPERIMENTS” spilled its contents over, knocking out some of Lisa’s old defunct experiments. One of the contents was a beaker filled with green liquid which crashed into the floor. Another content in particular was a futuristic-looking remote that fell on the floor, conveniently aimed at Lincoln. When all the other experiments fell on it, the combined weight activated the remote, shooting a green laser from the antennae before it was completely snuffed by the crash.

Lincoln cringed and cowered in a fetal position as everything crashed around him. When he opened one eye, he saw he was still alive but laying in a green puddle. “Huh? What happened to me? Am I still alive?” Lincoln patted his body, then his face, then shone a big smile of relief. “I’m alive! That’s a relief. For a second there, I thought Lynn’s giant bowling ball was gonna crush me!”

Then Lincoln froze on the spot; something was terribly wrong. “Wait... a giant bowling ball?”

He turned his nose up to see a familiar bowling ball looming over him. The severe cracks around the finger holes where Lynn threw a particularly hard throw during a bowling tournament where she earned first prize because the judges wanted her out before she could cause anymore damage.

“But wait... that’s impossible... that’s Lynn’s bowling ball and I don’t remember it being so huge! It couldn’t have grown in size unless...” At a horrible realization, Lincoln looked around and saw everything was huge. The ceiling looked as high as the sky, the floor looked like it was in an extreme close-up view with high definition, and everything else stood over him as tall as the house itself, even taller.

“I’ve shrunk!? How is this possible!?” A staticky flicker got Lincoln’s attention. He turned and saw a familiar remote crushed underneath the pile of old knickknacks and junk, smoking as the circuits died out. “Of course, Lisa’s shrinking remote! She put this experiment away because it couldn’t work, but now it shrunk me and now I can’t get back to normal size! And then that means that wet spot I felt earlier was...”

Lincoln took a good look at the green puddle seeping from the cracks of the shattered beaker. “Lisa’s chemicals! Oh no! I got doused with her discarded chemicals!” Lincoln hurriedly three off his clothing until he was in his underwear and inspected his body. “How do I look!? Is my skin different!? Do I have some wings or a tentacle sprouting out!?”

“Lincoln, what was that noise!?” The tiny white-haired boy stopped as soon as he heard a familiar female voice coming up from the base of the attic steps. “You’d better not be screwing around up there ‘cause you’re gonna be in big trouble if you don’t get your chores done!”

He heard the attic steps creak and felt the footfalls as the giantess climbed up into the attic. “Whoa...” is all that the tiny boy could mutter as he was met with the gigantic looming figure of...

151231141.content:
Beyond the bushes was a large beach where the terrible waters crashed against the sandy shores in waves. Not too far from the edge of a water was a cliff, and on that cliff was a sculpture of a giant among giants with flowing curly hair and eight arms. Built inside of that cliff along with the statue was a simple beach house with a set of wooden stairs leading up to the porch.

The house seemed big enough to fit three people. Steven didn’t know if there was anyone living there, but with any luck, the homeowners wouldn’t be there, and even if there was, Steven’s learnt borrower skills would come in handy. Under the cover of a seashell, Steven scuttled across the sand towards the bottom step of the stairs. From the shape of the structure, it looked like climbing up was his best option.

Before he could make a move, the front screen door swung open, and out walked a young giant female human overlooking the beach. She raised her arms up and stretched. “What a beautiful day!” the giant female observed happily. “Makes me wanna go swimming... with my clothes on!”

The giant mounted over the railing, giggling as she landed in the sand on her bare feet and made a break for the seawater. She was slightly plump and shorter then most humans her age with thick thighs, arms, and breasts which all jiggled with her steps. Her skin was caramel and her long hair, covering up her left eye, was dyed amethyst, but the roots were black. The clothes she wore was a loose fuschia shirt with a black bra strap exposed, light purple jeans with the leggings torn off above the knees.

While the giggling plump giant made for the ocean, Steven, hiding behind the stairs, looked up at the sound of the screen door opening again. “Amethyst, don’t you dare jump in that ocean! I just got your clothes cleaned for you yesterday!”

The shrill voice belonged to another giant human woman, who strode down the stairs in pink ballet flats and knee-high orange socks. Her skin was as bright as a pearl and was as skinny as a walking stick insect. She had short strawberry blonde hair and a pointy nose, accompanied by a motherly scowl towards the rebellious plump girl. What she wore consisted of a pink skirt with short orange leggings, and a white crock tied at the waist by a bright pink ribbon.

The other giant who accompanied her was a dark-skinned woman with a curious air around her. She seemed so soft-spoke behind her thick lips. Her eyes seemed nonexistent behind the pair of sunglasses she wore, which fit well with her box-shaped afro. She wore a velvet red jacket with a magenta interior, and a midriff shirt that was split between pink and purple, showing off her abdominals. A pair of dark jeans covered her extremely thick thighs, and a pair of flat shoes with raspberry toe areas and bright pink heels covered her dark feet.

“Ah, come on, P, where’s your sense of adventure!?” the giant named Amethyst asked as she backed to the edge of the shore. “You have any idea what it feels like to have your soaked shirt cling to your body. If you wanna join me, then you might be the center of Rose’s attention if you know what I mean!”

“That... that’s not it at all!” The giant named P replied, sporting a shade of red. “Do you have any idea how sticky and briny it feels to wear a shirt soaked in saltwater!?”

“Yeah, of course I do! Why do you think I wanna swim in my clothes?”

“That’s not what I...!” P grumbled in frustration and turned to the darker giant. “Garnet, a little help?”

The giant human named Garnet adjusted her sunglasses and walked up to the stout giant. “Amethyst, trying to clean off saltwater from your clothing is an arduous process. It takes a lot of time, a lot of soap, a lot of water, and a lot of energy to wash your clothes as many times as it takes to clean the salt off. If you wade one toe into that water in those clothes, then the utility bills needed to clean your clothing will run up and you won’t have any money to spend on Cookie Cats.”

Amethyst felt herself grumble in defeat. “Fine, I’ll go put on a stupid swimsuit.”

Steven sucked behind the stairs as the giant human walked over him on the steps, giving him a view of her dirty plump soles as they were escalated up the stairs. The tiny borrower decided now was as good as any time to climb up the stairs while the other two humans engaged in a stressful conversation.

“This rebellious side of her is getting ridiculous. I don’t know why she’s like this,” P vented.

“Pearl, this is a common phase in teenagers that they go through adolescence. You know this as well as I do,” Garnet told the human, Pearl, adjusting her sunglasses. “Amethyst’s case requires love and patience with her. She’s been a lot since before Rose took her in... before we all took her in.”

“I know, and I have tried, Garnet,” Pearl answered, “but every time I try to give her the benefit of the doubt, she looks at me like I’m king of stranger! I brought this up time and time again to Rose, and every time, she says the same thing that you’re saying: love and patience.”

“That’s all the more reason why we should keep practicing it,” Garnet replies. “Rose saw something in her the same way she saw something in us. We mustn’t take Amethyst for granted. There are rules to set, but we have to show her there’s a better way for all this.”

Steven wasn’t paying much attention as he climbed up the railing of the stairs with ease. So far, none of them has ever seen the figure of a tiny boy crawling up the steps like it was nothing. This was good because a borrower being spotted meant the possible end for a borrower itself. Steven climbed up two sets of stairs, the first set leading to the second set, and the second set leading up to the porch. The young borrower managed to make it to the last step of the stairs when...
151231141.title: The Beach House

choices: The humans take the borrower boy inside.
A motherly voice asks, “What is going on here?”
Someone was coming! Steven has to hide!
1512311413.content:
...the screen door swung open, and the grumbling, grumpy form of the human named Amethyst stood at the doorway. She was apparently changed out of her clothes and into a black swimsuit covering her thighs and her thick breasts.

“I just changed into my swimsuit, Pearl. I hope you’re happy,” the crabbed Amethyst called out as she took her first few steps.

The shadow of Amethyst’s giant form enveloped Steven’s tiny form. He was unable to move in time, only having that much time to nearly scream as Amethyst’s pudgy barefoot squashed him against the porch, flattening him against her sole. “Huh? What the...?”

The weight against Steven’s body was lifted along with the plump foot from the wooden floor. He moaned breathlessly as the barefoot was overturned, positioned so that he was laying on his back against the plush skin of the human’s barefoot. The human herself went wide-eyed as she observed the little creature she accidentally stepped on.

“Wait, is that...?” Steven turned to the voice and gasped as the excited human reached down and gently plucked him off of her foot. She held the young borrower in cupped hands and observed Steven taking one good look at her gigantic face and immediately curled up in a fetal position. “No way! Unreal!”

“Amethyst, what’s going on up there?” Pearl called out to Amethyst as she and Garnet noticed her picking something off of her foot.

All of a sudden, Amethyst grew a Cheshire Cat grin, which made Steven cower further into the pillowy palm flesh. “Oh man, I gotta show you to Garnet and Pearl. They’re gonna flip so much, their heads are gonna spin!”

Before Steven could protest, the giant human clamped her fist tightly, trapping the poor tiny boy in a claustrophobic cage of pudgy and warm flesh. He screamed as he was rocked by the motion of Amethyst running down the stairs while pumping her fists. Then he was overturned and imprisoned with both cupped hands and held close to the human’s chest. “Hey Garnet! Pearl! Look at what I found on the stairs!”

Pearl scoffed. “Please, Amethyst, if it’s another one of your big tricks, then…”

Amethyst opened her hand, revealing the tiny borrower who clinched at the light. He was then engaged in a surprising staring contest between him, and the humans Pearl and Garnet. Steven squealed, which made Pearl squeal and Garnet gasp. “Oh no! This wasn’t supposed to happen! You weren’t supposed to see me!”

“Amethyst, what on Earth is that thing!?” Pearl demanded to know.

“I don’t know. He looks like a kid to me. I kinda found him climbing on the porch when I accidentally stepped on him,” Amethyst answered. “Can we keep him!?”

“What!? No!” Pearl screeched. “Amethyst, this is a child we’re talking about! He’s a human being, not a house pet! Besides, just look at him! He Looks like he just hiked through an entire forest by his lonesome! You don’t know what disease he might have!”

“Well, duh! That’s why I wanna keep him!” Pearl shook her head at Amethyst’s insistence. “Aw, c’mon, Pearl, I promise I’ll look after him. I’ll feed him, I’ll bathe him, I’ll keep an eye on him, I’ll even do all that mamby-pamby cleaning stuff you do around the house!”

“It is not mamby-pamby, Amethyst,” Pearl grumbled, “and what you’re talking about is keeping a little boy the size of your finger as a pet! This boy has his own free will, and now you’re scaring him just by saying you wanna keep him in a cage!”

“Where else are we gonna put him, P!? He’s so small, he could crawl inside the walls and escape!” Amethyst barked back.

“Maybe, but the fact is that this boy is frightened because you stepped on him and you’re willing to keep him in captivity!”

“Maybe he’s scared because you’re being so bossy and loud!”

Pearl gasped in exasperation. “Bossy and loud!? Maybe he’s scared because you’re obnoxious and unruly!”

“Enough, bit of you! You’re both scaring him!” Garnet shouted, immediately silencing the two bickering women. She squatted down so she was face-to-face with the frightened tiny boy. Steven could see his reflection through her glasses. “It’s okay, we’re not going to hurt you. My name is Garnet. This is Pearl, and the one holding you is Amethyst.”

“Hello…”

“‘Sup?”

“Do you have a name?” Garnet asked the boy, quivering in Amethyst’s palm.

“It’s S-S-S-Steven,” the borrower stuttered.

“And where did you come from?”

“Th-The forest,” Steven stammered nervously. “I-I-I had to move because a mudslide washed away my house during the last rainfall, along with my dad.”

“Oh no, that’s terrible,” Pearl gasped.

“Yeah, man, that’s rough,” Amethyst said with as much sympathy as she could muster.

“And you’ve been trying to find a place to live since then?” Garnet asked the tiny boy, who nodded with a whimper. She took a close look at the backpack he wore, a little rag tied with a single button the size of his belly. “I’m sorry, Steven. It must be hard trying to find a new home, being a borrower in your case.”

“A borrower? You know what he is, Garnet?” Pearl asked.

“I do. I read books about his species,” Garnet said. “They are tiny people who scurry about the walls and collect scraps little scraps and trinkets to survive. There have been times where some have been captured from their families and were hardly ever seen again. That’s why they hide from plain sight. I thought they were just fiction, but I never thought I could meet one in person.“

“What are we going to do, Garnet?” Pearl asked the black woman. “We can’t take him in without everyone not knowing about his existence. I can see Ruby, Sapphire, and Rose being fine with taking him in, but our extended families can’t know about him! If they found out about Steven, they might hurt him or take him away to be shown off in a cage like a captive animal! He’s a tiny human being!”

“No, we can’t,” Garnet agreed with Pearl’s sentiment, “but we can’t let him wander off into the wilderness alone. He’s a child. He lost his father and he needs someone to love him, someone to help raise him and lift him up through his hardships. If any of our sisters ever find out he exists, we’ll find a way around it, but leaving him out where the elements can turn against him is a far worse fate than he deserves.”

“But, Garnet...”

“Steven will be staying with us,” Garnet firmly stated. “He’s a lost soul like we were until Rose took us in. We owe it to help him just like we helped each other.”

If there was one thing Garnet was known for, it was knowing how to drive the point home. No one could ever go against Garnet’s logic, no matter how much they try to find their way around it. She’s always been a good judge of character and accepting, which is why she was a favorite among the other “sisters” Rose took in. At this point...
1512311413.title: Found by Amethyst

151351221.content:
“Alexis! I’m coming for you, my darling! I’m coming!”

The lovesick fool Syrus Truesdale paddled across the lake in a rowboat he borrowed, headed straight for the Obelisk Blue Girl’s Dormitory. Having received a fake love letter as part of a ploy by the devious Dr. Crowler by mistake, Syrus rowed his way to the girl’s dorm at night, completely under the influence of the love bug.

When he got to the dorm, he hadn’t counted on Dr. Crowler hiding in the bushes near the front gate, waiting and watching for the Slifer Slacker, Jaden Yuki, to take the bait. “This will be perfect, thanks to that faux love letter I wrote!” he said, waiting by the front doors where he destroyed the lock of the front gate. “Jaden will show up looking for Alexis, but all he’ll find is trouble instead. Once he arrives, the dormitory’s newest security system will change his life in a big way because he’ll be reduced to the size of a bug! Then, once he is shrunken and found by the girls, they’ll have to keep him as a pet and keep him out of my hair!”

Crowler cackled, but as soon as he saw a bit of red approaching, he quickly shut up and ducked back into the bushes. “Come, Jaden, right into my trap like the Slifer sap you are.”

But then he saw that bit of red was attached to an excitable head of blue hair. “Alexis?”

“That’s not Jaden! It’s that stammering Field Spell nitwit!” Crowler practically screamed.

Compelled by his foolish love, Syrus opened the gate, swinging into an infrared laser positioned at the entrance. All of a sudden, a couple of pylons shot up from the ground and emitted a strange green light, engulfing the unfortunate Syrus in its glow. Then, as quickly as the light faded, Syrus found himself facing a new entirely gigantic world.

“What!? W-what happened to me!? Why am I so small!?” Syrus panicked, Crowler watching the pitiful display with grit teeth.

“Blast it! That nitwit completely ruined my trap!” the antagonistic vice-chancellor growled. “No matter, with him gone, I can have one less Slifer slacker giving me trouble. I’ll just have to find another way to get rid of Jaden.”

“Over there! I saw the green light by the front gate!”

“A boy tried to get in!”

“Get him!”

A cacophony of female voices arose from the distance as they stampede towards the entrance. Crowler’s pencil-like body stiffened at the noise. “Oh good gracious! I’ve got to get out of here!” he said, hopping out of the bushes and diving into the lake.

Poor little Syrus, meanwhile, was too scared as he was entirely surrounded by giant pairs of feet, either bare or in slippers, all of whom belonging to the suddenly giant girls who looked down at him with all different flavors of fiery anger. Two of the girls in particular, Jasmine and Mindy, stepped up to the tiny boy, the former snatching him up in her hand.

“H-Hey, let me go, please!” Syrus begged while being tightly restrained in the giantess’s hold.

“Not until you tell us why you’re here,” Jasmine said, “and it better be good.”

What does she end up doing after he told her?
151351221.title: The Girls’ Tiny Intruder

1522112.content:
In this route, the Disney Princesses spends their free time inside the Castello Delle Principesse, a large castle which acts as a hub world between here and the princesses’ worlds of origin.

Like many other castles, the Castello Delle Principesse is a large and beautiful fortification surrounded by a deep most and a single stone bridge leading them across the moat. The castle includes many bedrooms to accommodate each princess, a kitchen, a lounging room, a large dining room, a library twice the size of the library in the Beast’s castle, and a backyard which consists a large lake, a garden hedge maze with blooming roses, an apple orchard, and a surrounding forest. At the other side of the verdant forest, is the barrier surrounding the perimeter of the castle grounds.

The castle staff is dedicated to the upkeep of the castle and to the servitude of the princesses. Among these staff is their youngest member, a young page named Edwin (age 10), a boy with blue eyes and dirty blonde hair who was raised to work to serve the princesses. Now that being said, we have a few scenarios involving the young page.

Little Page: Edwin, thirsty from working the castle, accidentally drinks a goal of sweet liquid labeled “Drink Me” from Alice in Wonderland and shrinks down to tiny size. If being reduced to the size of a bug doesn’t scare him, then perhaps surviving the gigantic princesses will.

Tiny Born Servant: Edwin is born a minizora but is usually the center of the princesses’ attention because of their affection for all things cute and tiny. The princesses all require small favors from Edwin which, to him, is just favors.

-or-

Their Royal Mile Highnesses: Edwin accidentally served pastries labeled “Eat Me” from Alice in Wonderland and all of the princesses who ate them grow by fifty feet, maybe more. Feeling guilty, Edwin allows the princesses to rightly punish him for his mistake.

15321.title: Link

153211.content:
This incarnation of Link is the protagonist of both Ocarina of Time and Majora’s Mask.

Young Link was thrust into preserving the safety of the world at Young Zelda’s request where Ganondorf threatened to dominate the land of Hyrule. After pulling out the Master Sword, Young Link was sealed away for seven years, during which time Ganondorf ruled the world. Link assembled the Sages, rescued Princess Zelda, and defeated Ganondorf, thus saving the world. However, the cost of his heroic deeds was that Link was sent back in time to prevent Ganondorf from carrying out his evil plans.

Some time after, Link rode horseback into the Lost Woods to find his guardian fairy, Navi, who left Link’s side after his adventures through time. There, he is robbed by a Skull Kid and his two fairy companions, Tatl and Tael, wearing the evil hexing relic, Majora’s Mask. Link is transformed by Skull Kid into a Deku Scrub and followed the imp into the alternate world of Termina where it is doomed to be destroyed by a falling moon in three days. By the request of the mysterious Happy Mask Salesman and Tael, Link and Tatl travel through Termina to free the Four Giants from captivity, defeat Skull Kid, and save the world.

After Majora’s Mask, the rest of Link’s life was shrouded by mystery, until it was revealed that he lingered on as the Hero’s Shadow in Twilight Princess because he heavily regretted that he couldn’t pass on his skills with a sword in his time.

Despite only appearing in only a couple of canon Zelda games, the young Hero of Time has also appeared in other non-canonical games such as Hyrule Warriors and the Super Smash Bros. series (but the latter is in a different route altogether).

Which of these games should be the main setting of the story?

1535521.content:
There was no greater privilege than being born in greatness, for young Shiv was born from Sindel and Shao Kahn, the tyrannical ruler of Outworld. The problem was that Shiv was born the size of a thumb and Shao Kahn had no need of an heir who was too small to rule over Outworld so he tried to have him killed.

However, Sindel and her daughter, Kitana could not let him kill the young prince, no matter who we was born to, so through Mortal Kombat, both mother and daughter put their differences aside, killed Shao Kahn and succeeded the throne, with Sindel ruling over Outworld as Kahn. Thousands of years have passed since then, with Sindel Kahn sitting on the throne of Outworld with her daughter by her side, each of them protected by Sheeva and Jade respectively. They all took the time to raise Shiv, training the tiny boy in Mortal Kombat, how to fight despite his tiny size. He is growing into a formidable fighter, having defeated giants with his tiny-sized fatalities.

To the Earthrealmers, he appears nine years old when he is actually 3,500 years old.

Which route will this story take place?
1535521.title: The Tiny Prince of Outworld

15355214.content:
One day, Shiv spent his morning like any other morning, waking up in his bed on his mother’s nightstand, spending his time clearing his mind through meditation until the sun fully rose from the horizon, and sneaking out to the training grounds. He honed his physical skills into dodging traps, practiced his moves on the training dummies, and learned to wield his nagitana weapon to uniquely set himself apart from his mother and sister.

Shiv was midway during his training through the morning sun’s ascension into the sky when he felt the tremors of giant feet approaching him. He turned to face a pair of feet with two dark toes strapped in sandals. He looked up to see Sheeva, queen of the Shokan, protector of Sindel Kahn, looming over him, her four arms off to her sides.

“Prince Shiv, your mother requests you grant an audience with her,” Sheeva said, squatting down and holding her palm out for the tiny prince to climb on.

The one thing Shiv loved about Sheeva was how she carried him around the castle, cupped in two clammy palms while the other two palms acted like a guardrail so he wouldn’t fall off. The queen of the Shokan carried the tiny heir to Outworld into the throne room where his mother sat high on the throne while his sister and her protector stood off to the side. Sheeva held out the tiny prince to the Kahn, who knelt in respect for the woman who conceived him.

“You wished to see me, mother?” Shiv inquired.

“It has come to my attention, son, that you have been sneaking out into the training grounds by your lonesome in order to hone your skills,” Sindel said with an air of regality. “While it is commendable that you are practicing for kombat, it is ill-advised that you should leave yourself open where our enemies will attack you on the spot. That is why the time has come for you to be assigned a bodyguard, one who will protect you from any attempt on your life.”

“But mother, you and Kitana and your protectors have shielded me from attacks before,” Shiv retorted. “Why shouldn’t they be the ones to protect me?”

“Because we will all not always be around to protect you should anything happen,” Sindel answered. She carefully scooped Shiv out of Sheeva’s hands and held him to her face. “You are an heir to the throne of Outworld. One day, my son, you will take the throne, and you must have someone to protect you and guard you with their lives. That is why I have arranged for someone from one of the other realms with exceptional skills to live with us and keep watch over you.”

The doors to the throne room was opened, and through it came the female Kombatant of his mother’s choice. Who was it that Sindel chose?

1535531.content:
Timmy was only a boy of ten years when he and his brother Brian witnessed one of the greatest fights between heroes vs. villains inside the Overwatch Museum. Overwatch vs. Talon. Winston and Tracer vs. Widowmaker and Reaper over Doomfist’s powerful gauntlet.

He remembered his Brian ordered his tiny brother to stay hidden as he set him up on the stand obscured by the broken glass. Then Brian went out and helped the two famous Overwatch agents beat the Talon agents by using their own arm-shaped payload against them. When Widowmaker and Reaper retreated, Timmy remembered how Tracer told the two boys, “You know, the world could use more heroes.” That was the greatest day of the boys’ lives.

Not more than six months later passed by since then that the boys never stopped thinking about that day. Unfortunately, tragedy struck when Talon struck the shopping mall Timmy and his family went shopping at. Talon soldiers devastated the mall and everyone in it, except for a handful of survivors kidnapped to be used for Moira’s experiments, Timmy included. Timmy was the youngest victim taken by Talon, which intrigued Moira to the point where she focused most of her attention on experimenting on him.

One such experiment was forcing Timmy into a chamber where a radioactive veil swept over him, shrinking him to tiny size, the size of a thumb. Afterwards, they subjected him to many tests and discovered the chamber granted Timmy high physical durability and immunity to stomach acids. Upon this discovery, Timmy was often tested on by Moira, tortured by Widowmaker, and teased by Sombra for two straight months.

Then after the second month passed, salvation came for the traumatized shrunken boy when the female members of Overwatch took the Talon base by surprise, resulting in the rescue of three-quarters of the prisoners still alive. Tracer, who led the charge, found the tiny boy locked away in Moira’s office, huddled in his little energized cage. Tracer spent most of her time comforting the grieving boy in the aftermath.

Later, it was decided by Mercy and Tracer that the latter would adopt the tiny Timmy as her own little brother and be allowed to live with her and her lesbian partner, Emily. In addition, Timmy had to attend weekly psychiatric sessions with Mercy to help him with his psychological trauma from witnessing his family’s demise and being kept prisoner by Talon. Every day of the week, Timmy would be educated by the brilliant minds of Mei, D.Va, and Efi Oladele (with whom he falls in love with) to make up for the months of formal education lost in captivity.

Months after becoming a part of Tracer’s family and psychiatric sessions with Mercy, Timmy decided the only way for him to become brave was to train and become a member of Overwatch. Through training from various female members, and with the help of Hammond the mechanical genius hamster, Timmy is recruited into Overwatch as its youngest member to join. With the help of his new family, Timmy, the bite-sized boy is determined to avenge his old one.

What part of Timmy’s life are we focusing on?
